answers.answer: I have this condition, but once I got over the embarassment, my wife and I have had some VERY satisfying oral sex play -- both she and I REALLY enjoy experiencing the "sprouting" of my buried penis, over and over and over again -- her warm breath breathes life into almost every time!

MATE IVE GOT THE SAME ISH. MY NAME IS DARRELL PONT. SOMETIMES I LOOSE MY WILLY AND I SPEND A FEW DAYS LOOKING FOR IT. CAN YOU HELP ME FIND IT? IM REALLY WORRIED ITS FALLEN OFF.P.S I LOVE CAPS LOCK. MORE THAN I MISS MY WILLY.XXXXX

question: Dear Doctor,I recently went along to a Doctor with my older husband who is 60 years old. He has put on a lot of weight in the last 10 years of his life and has diabetes. The Doctor was checking his height and weight and doing a check up, when she said he has a buried penis. We are both quite confused (and slightly amused!). Does she mean this as an actual medical condition? Or does she mean that it was simply buried when she saw it? If it is an actual medical condition, what can we do about it? What are the options? We no longer have sexual intercourse, but would like to if we had the opportunity.
title: Buried Penis Syndrome?
